pr_title: Add license check to all PR builds

timeline.message: Add license check to all PR builds

timeline.bodyText: is there anything other than license check that we need?
timeline.author: ZacBlanco
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -93,7 +92,8 @@ if [ "$RUN_MAVEN" == "true" ]; then
     mvn $(echo "${ALLUXIO_SONAR_ARGS}") sonar:sonar
   fi
 else
-  echo "RUN_MAVEN was not set to true, skipping maven check"
+  echo "RUN_MAVEN was not set to true, skipping full maven check and only running license check"
+  mvn -Duser.home=/home/jenkins license:check

replies.bodyText: license check has been the one that's slipped passed the PR build and caused post-merge failures. i don't recall any other type of failure that has slipped through similarly
replies.author: Xenorith
